types.name: CustomShapeGeometry
desc: This property describes the geometry of the CustomShape.
The CustomShapeEngine that is used should be able to get on with the content of this property.

If the CustomShapeEngine property is \"com.sun.star.drawing.EnhancedCustomShapeEngine\", then this property is containing properties as they are specified in the service com.sun.star.drawing.EnhancedCustomShapeGeometry

properties.name: CustomShapeData
desc: This property can be used to store data that the CustomShapeEngine may use for rendering.

properties.name: CustomShapeEngine
desc: This property contains the CustomShapeEngine service name that has to be used for rendering.

properties.name: Opaque
desc: determines if the object is opaque or transparent for text.

properties.name: Transformation
desc: this property lets you get and set the transformation matrix for this shape.
The transformation is a 3x3 homogeneous matrix and can contain translation, rotation, shearing and scaling.

properties.name: ZOrder
desc: is used to query or change the ZOrder of this Shape.
